comment.author: 43854658@N00
comment._content: "When Maria [Gibian] Roderiques and Josefino Lopes Cabral were married in 1928, as "colored people" they had to settle for a rectory wedding. The wedding party included Frank Correia, Florence Roderick, Isabella Mendes, Dorothy Burgo, Elizabeth Mendes, and Isabella Burgo." –NHA This wedding portrait was not printed in the local Nantucket paper until some 50 years later. [1] 24 years later, in 1952, their daughter, Norma Elizabeth Cabral married Albert Teixeira. Theirs was the first "Cape Verdean" wedding allowed to be held in the Cathedral [Our Lady of the Isle Church]. "Norma Cabral & Albert Teixeira"

comment._content: beautiful.  love the white dresses the girls are wearing with the handkerchief hems.  I'm sure the braided girl was a stunning young woman!
